name: Ninh Hai DO
3_18_text: For question 3.(r), I did it correctly but I inadvertently commented it out when debugging other questions, and I forgot uncommented it back. This question is super easy in the way that all we have to do is to uncomment some lines of coding with no need to add anything else. Thus, there is no way that one can do wrong when he comes there. I kindly ask you to give me full credit for this question by comparing my coding with the solution, as I tried very hard for this homework and I do not want to lose any point for my silly mistake. Because of the nature of this homework (the whole question 3 is huge and confusing for debugging) and because you are also a student and you understand well how much effort we put on it, I kindly ask for your sympathy to give me full credit.
